clues.text: For a gluttonous Thanksgiving gorge-fest try turducken, a turkey stuffed with these other 2 animals

Liszt's music was influenced by this Polish pianist, who first met George Sand through Liszt

rounds.text: Golf carts used by the crew in the production of this 2009 movie bore signs reading "Galileo" & "Bernini"
